description: The NST segment allows network statistical information to be passed between the various systems on the network. Some fields in this segment refer to portions of lower level protocols; they contain information that can be used by network management applications monitoring the state of various network links

1.name: Statistics Available
1.description: This field contains an indicator if statistics are available. Refer to HL7 table 0136 - Yes/no indicator for valid values
1.data_type: ID - Coded values for HL7 tables

10.name: Checksum Errors Received
10.description: This field contains the number of messages received with checksum errors

11.name: Length Errors Received
11.description: This field contains the number of messages received with length errors

12.name: Other Errors Received
12.description: This field contains the number of “other” invalid messages received (excluding length and checksum errors)

13.name: Connect Timeouts
13.description: This field contains the number of connect timeout errors

14.name: Receive Timeouts
14.description: This field contains the number of timeouts while waiting for a response to an initiated message

15.name: Network Errors
15.description: This field contains the number of network errors in response to an initiated message.

2.name: Source Identifier
2.description: This field identifies a particular lower level link (e.g., a port number).

3.name: Source Type
3.description: This field identifies (in certain systems) whether a lower level source identifier is an initiate or accept type. Refer to HL7 table 0332 - Network source type for valid values.
3.data_type: ID - Coded values for HL7 tables

4.name: Statistics Start
4.description: This field contains the date/time stamp of the start of the collection of the statistics reported in fields 6-15 of this segment. It is strongly recommended that this value include seconds

5.name: Statistics End
5.description: This field contains the date/time stamp of the end of the statistics collection period reported in fields 6-15 of this segment. It is strongly recommended that this value include seconds

6.name: Receive Character Count
6.description: This field contains the number of characters received

7.name: Send Character Count
7.description: This field contains the number of characters sent

8.name: Messages Received
8.description: This field contains the number of messages received

9.name: Messages Sent
9.description: This field contains the number of messages sent
